name: Skipray Rally Racer VR
description:
Leap into the exciting world of Virtual Reality with SkipRay Rally Racer VR!

Race through an endless fast-paced obstacle course collecting score boosting power-ups and health charges while avoiding numerous rock hazards.

SkipRay Rally Racer VR is a simple to learn and use VR game in which your head is the game controller. Tilting your head to the left or right and up or down will steer your racer during exciting game play.

** Note - a Google Cardboard or equivalent VR headset that support iPhone devices is required for proper play. **
